Moataz Nasr bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, onye na-ese ihe mgbasa ozi na onye na-akpọ onwe ya onye na-eme ihe gbasara ọdịbendị.
A mụrụ Nasr na Alexandria n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1961

Nna ya kwenyere na nka abụghị ọrụ, naanị ihe ntụrụndụ, ya mere Nasr chọtara onwe ya na-amụ ihe gbasara akụ na ụba na Mahadum Alexandria. Ntinye mbụ nke Nasr n'ime ihe nkiri nka Ijipt mere na 1995 mgbe ọ banyere n'ọrụ ya na asọmpi nke Ngalaba Ọdịbendị Ijipt haziri ma nata ihe nrite nke atọ. Otú ọ dị, ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya katọrọ ya maka ịbụ "onye na-anọghị" na nka, ebe ọ na-amụbeghị ya na agụmakwụkwọ.
Nasr banyere n'ihe nkiri nka mba ụwa na 2001 mgbe otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi nka ndị isi Itali, Galleria Continua, gosipụtara ọrụ ya

Nasr esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi kemgbe ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye nke gụnyere: ọnọdụ nke atọ na 7th Salon of Youth, asọmpi nke Ministry of Culture haziri na 1995, ihe nrite nke eserese na ihe ngosi Heliorama site na French Cultural Center na Cairo na 1997, Grand Prize na 8th International Cairo Biennale na 2001, ihe nrite Biennale site na Dakar Biennale nke Senegal na 2002, ihe nrite Ministri nke Ọdịbendị, Dakart Biennale, Dakar, Senegal na 2004 na Grand Prize, Sharjah Bienniale, UAE na 2005.
Na Nọvemba 2008, Nasr guzobere otu Darb 1718

Darb 1718 bụ ebe nka na ọdịbendị nke oge a nke Ijipt nke dị na mpaghara Fustat nke Old Cairo Ọ bụ òtù na-enweghị uru edebanyere aha nke nwere ebumnuche nke ịbụ "trampoline iji kwalite ọrụ nka nke oge a na-eto eto na Egypt". Ọ na-ezube igosi nka nke oge a na nke mba ụwa, idebe ihe osise na idebe nchekwa data zuru oke nke nka na Egypt na mpaghara MENA, yana ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ihu agụmakwụkwọ site n'inye ụlọ ọrụ, ọrụ na ihe nkiri. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-achọkwa itinye aka na obodo Fustat site na ọrụ obodo na mmemme mgbasa ozi. Nasr sonyere na 2017 Venice Biennial na ntinye vidiyo na Egypt pavilion.
